comments:
I20041101

Select a method in the Outline view
Drag it over the Navigator view

(which is currently quitely eaten by the SWT DND mechanism but in the very 
near future this exception will be thrown):

For the LocalSelectionTransfer transfer case, it's not properly handling the
case where the selected element adapts to IResource but is not itself an IResource.
Created an attachment (id=16624)
Patch for fix
Patch released for M4.
Verified in I20041216-1200
